oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Keys of Dr. Elihu Pierce
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Among these keys are those to the medical field case of Asst. Surgeon Dr. Elihu Pierce, 6th N. H. Inf., USA. There is a tag from his Masonic Lodge in Winchester, New Hampshire, Philesian Lodge No. 40. Pierce also served on the 9th Army Corps Train in Alexandria, Virginia at the end of the war.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
